CustomField.description: Used for Vitals intake. Patient's serum glucose level within 20 - 600 mg/dl
CustomField.inlineHelpText: You must enter a value between 20-600. Values outside this range should be treated as a medical emergency. If the home glucometer reads: " HI" or "high" enter 600 into the numeric field. If the home glucometer reads: "low" enter 20 into the numeric field.
CustomField.label: Serum Glucose
